Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Prerequisites needed to use this skill:

1. One of the following XORO Receiver
- XORO HRK 7659 SMART 
- XORO HRK 7660 SMART
- XORO HRT 7620 SMART
- XORO HRS 8659 SMART 
- XORO HRS 8660 SMART
2. A DiscVision IoT Account
- For that go to https://voice.discvision.de/
- To create a new Acount click on Register here
- Fill up all necessary Fields
- In Devices click on +
- Then you get a four digit Key.
- Enter this Key in the menu of your Receiver under Menu -> USB and Apps -> Network Apps -> Smart Home -> Input Key
- When you want to change the name of your Receiver then click on the pen symbol under Actions. Then you can choose a name from the list. After that you have to click on the Disk symbol under Actions to save the name.
3. Activate the XORO SMART CONTROL Skill. Then you will redirected to DiscVision IoT Site. Here you log in with your account. After that a discover for your smart home devices starts. Your Receiver will be add to Smart Home -> Devices.
You finished the Pairing of your Receiver and now can use this Skill.

This Skill allows you to control your XORO Receiver.

Here the commands to control your Receiver:
- Alexa, change channel to 200 on [Living room]
- Alexa, change channel to ZDF on [Living room]
- Alexa, next channel on [Living room]
- Alexa, previous channel on [Living room]
- Alexa, turn off [Living room]
- Alexa, set the volume to 30 on [Living room]
- Alexa, turn down the volume by 20 on [Living room]
- Alexa, turn up the volume by 20 on [Living room]
- Alexa, mute [Living room]
- Alexa, unmute [Living room]

In the example Phrases we take livingroom as device name. When you have a different device name then you have to replace livingroom with your devicename.

This Skill covers only a little part of what the Skill XORO Smart Remote offers. The advantage of this Skill is that you don't need to say "Alexa, open Xoro Receiver" anymore. Here it's enough to say Alexa and then the command.
